definition: dead drunk/as drunk as a lord

sentences.english: My parents were not interested in whether I went to school or got drunk on white wine." - Die Zeit
sentences.chinese: 我的家人並不在意我是否去學校喝得酩酊大醉。

sentences.english: Till they drop, blind in blood, without a blow.
sentences.chinese: 噬血，毋須一擊，倒於酩酊。

sentences.english: While drunk, she leaves Ross a message saying she's over him.
sentences.chinese: 酩酊大醉的瑞秋打電話給羅斯留言說，她已忘了他。

sentences.english: He is on the sace most of the time.
sentences.chinese: 他大部分的時間都喝得酩酊大醉。

sentences.english: He found it hard to resist the temptation to get very drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他發現要抵拒酒的誘惑而不喝個酩酊大醉很不容易。

sentences.english: He got drunk and made a spectacle of himself in the club.
sentences.chinese: 埃迪在昨晚聚會上喝得酩酊大醉，醜態百出。

sentences.english: By then, Sikes was very drunk, and Fagin got up to leave.
sentences.chinese: 到這時，賽克斯已喝得酩酊大醉了。

sentences.english: In less than an hour Andy's skate had turned to an icy yacht.
sentences.chinese: 不出一小時，安迪的微醺變成了酩酊大醉。

sentences.english: They doctored her fruit juice with vodka and she got very drunk.
sentences.chinese: 他們在她喝的果汁裏攙入了伏特加酒致使她酩酊大醉。

sentences.english: He seemed to oscillate between very drunk and icy sober .
sentences.chinese: 他似乎是在酩酊大醉和完全清醒之間擺來擺去。

definition: lit. as drunk as mud/completely drunk
to have a few drinks/to drink to one's heart's content
to pour wine/to drink wine/to deliberate/to consider
